page.title: 15NOT SUCH HAPPY FAMILIES!
page.content: I am worried about the number of people in my school who have serious family problems. Some parents seem to argue all the time, sometimes so much that families break up. When that happens mums won't speak to dads and sometimes they argue about who the children are going to live with, and families have to go to court to sort everything out. I'm not going to let this happen to me when I grow up. Being able to buy all the things they want doesn't seem to make families any happier nowadays and more and more couples are being divorced. I wouldn't mind not having a colour television, or a car, or the latest automatic washing machine or a dishwasher if I could just have a husband who loved me and our children. I have family problems too. {By Haley,age10
